rev.comment: "farsi" is a Persian word, just as "deutsch" and "francais" are German and French words. in English we say Persian, German and French, not farsi, deutsch or francais.
/* Influence of Arabic on other languages */ [¶2] removing [[hyphen]]: → "commonly used"—see [[WP:HYPHEN]], sub-subsection 3, point 4
